name: Keeping Cool
description:
This game is my contribution to the Wowie 3.0 game jam.

This game has 5 levels where the goal is to finish the level within the given time, like time trials.
As the theme of the jam is "Failure is progress" your goal as player is to stay on the level until you have missed the goal time.

Please play in fullscreen, becase I can't get the frame on itch to the actual game size.
The downloadable file is the Windows build of the game. Only difference between the two is that the windows build allows pausing the game with Esc.
